alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Pierce; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:32PM CDT until July 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WAYNE...NORTHEASTERN PIERCE AND CEDAR COUNTIES... At 431 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Ponca State Park to 7 miles south of Randolph, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hartington, Laurel, Randolph, Coleridge, Wynot, Belden, McLean, Obert, Sholes, The Highway 84 and 15 Junction, Brooky Bottom, Camp Assurance and The Highway 81 And 20 Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
